00034  *  \addtogroup rf230mac

00038 /**
00039  * \file
00040  * \brief  Example glue code between the existing MAC code and the
00041  *         Contiki mac interface
00042  *
00043  * \author
00044  *         Mike Vidales <mavida404@gmail.com>
00045  *
00046  * \ingroup ieee_15_4
00047  *
00048  */
00049 
00050 #ifndef __IEEEMANAGER_H__
00051 #define __IEEEMANAGER_H__
00052 
00053 /** \brief The interface structure for the 802.15.4 quasi-MAC. */
00054 typedef struct ieee_15_4_manager{
00055     /** Turn the MAC layer on. */
00056     int (* wake)(void);
00057     /** Turn the MAC layer off. */
00058     int (* sleep)(void);
00059 
00060     /** Set the operating channel. */
00061     void (* set_channel)(int channel);
00062     /** Get the operating channel. */
00063     int (* get_channel)(void);
00064 
00065     /** Set the Destination PAN_ID. */
00066     void (* set_dst_panid)(int panid);
00067     /** Get the Destination PAN_ID. */
00068     int (* get_dst_panid)(void);
00069 
00070     /** Set the Source PAN_ID. */
00071     void (* set_src_panid)(int panid);
00072     /** Get the Source PAN_ID. */
00073     int (* get_src_panid)(void);
00074 
00075     /** Set the Automatic TRX modes. */
00076     void (* set_auto_mode)(bool mode);
00077     /** Get the current state of Automatic TRX modes. */
00078     bool (* get_auto_mode)(void);
00079 
00080     /** Set the Long Address. */
00081     void (* set_long_addr)(uint64_t address);
00082     /** Get the Long Address. */
00083     uint64_t (* get_long_addr)(void);
00084 
00085     /** Set the Short Address. */
00086     void (* set_short_addr)(int address);
00087     /** Get the short Address. */
00088     int (* get_short_addr)(void);
00089 
00090     /** Set the iAmCoord bit. */
00091     void (* set_iamcoord_bit)(bool iamcoord);
00092     /** Get the iAmCoord bit. */
00093     bool (* get_iamcoord_bit)(void);
00094 
00095     /** Set the Coordinator Long address. */
00096     void (* set_coord_long_addr)(uint64_t address);
00097     /** Get the Coordinator Long address. */
00098     uint64_t (* get_coord_long_addr)(void);
00099 
00100     /** Set the Coordinator Long address. */
00101     void (* set_coord_short_addr)(int address);
00102     /** Get the Coordinator Long address. */
00103     int (* get_coord_short_addr)(void);
00104 
00105     /** Set the Destination address. */
00106     void (* set_dest_long_addr)(uint64_t address);
00107     /** Get the Destination address. */
00108     uint64_t (* get_dest_long_addr)(void);
00109 } ieee_15_4_manager_t;
00110 
00111 
00112 void ieee_15_4_init(struct ieee_15_4_manager *pieee_15_4_manager);
00113 
00114 #endif /* __IEEEMANAGER_H__ */
00115 /** \} */
